Row.Text: [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Satellites[ENDCOLOR] are an additional option when capturing a City-State. Instead of taking that City-State's Capital, a 'Statellite Government' may be installed, immediately granting a large amount of Influence with them.
By turning the City into a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Satellite[ENDCOLOR], you will liberate this city and immediately gain +{1_Num} [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with them.
